      • spaceFormat

        public static java.lang.String[] spaceFormat(long number)

        Basic knowledge: The smallest bit (byte)

        Provisions: 1、If less than 1M =》1MB 2、If less than 100M =》%dMB 3、If greater than 100M =》 %.2fGB

        input params: value => KB
